overview.tax_residency_rules: Ordinary resident based on physical presence and/or center of vital interests.

personal_income_tax.exemptions: Personal allowances vary based on factors such as age and disability status.
personal_income_tax.social_security: Universal Social Charge (USC) of 2% - 11% on income.

corporate_tax.deductions: Various deductions available, including interest expenses, depreciation, and research and development.

capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Gains on the sale of a principal private residence are exempt.
capital_gains_tax.indexation: Indexation is available for certain assets to adjust for inflation.

vat_gst.reduced_rate: 13.5% and 9% on certain goods and services.
vat_gst.exemptions: Exemptions include healthcare, education, and financial services.

property_tax.exemptions: Exemptions may be available for certain types of properties, such as owner-occupied homes.

inheritance_tax.exemptions: Thresholds and exemptions vary depending on the relationship to the deceased.

digital_nomad_visa.requirements: Must meet certain income and employment criteria.
digital_nomad_visa.tax_benefits: Tax exemption on foreign income for the first 3 years of residency.
digital_nomad_visa.duration: Initially granted for 1 year, renewable for up to 5 years.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Ireland has an extensive network of double taxation agreements.

crypto_tax.income_tax_rate: Taxed as income, depending on the individual's tax bracket.

nft_tax.income_tax_rate: Taxed as income, depending on the individual's tax bracket.

additional_notes.political_risks: Ireland has a stable political environment with low political risks.
additional_notes.economic_stability: Ireland has a strong and stable economy with low inflation and currency volatility.
additional_notes.legal_system: Ireland has a well-established legal system with strong enforcement mechanisms.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 16th in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
